text: Two ships of the Royal Fleet Auxiliary have borne the name RFA Derwentdale: * was a oiler and landing ship, gantry launched in 1941 and sold in 1960. * was a mobile reserve tanker launched in 1964 as Halcyon Breeze. She was acquired in 1967 and returned to her owners in 1974. Category:Royal Fleet Auxiliary ship names
title: RFA Derwentdale
